passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > form > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > form > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h3

html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > form > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > form > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > form > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > form > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(1) > h3
